fundingOpportunities: Seed funding from venture capital firms

riskAnalysis.legalRisk: Medium - Ensure all licenses are current and compliance documentation is maintained. Review contracts regularly.
riskAnalysis.financialRisk: High - Limited revenue stream. Focus on achieving product-market fit and securing initial funding.
riskAnalysis.marketRisk: Medium - Competitive landscape requires continuous innovation. Conduct regular market analysis and customer feedback cycles.
riskAnalysis.cyberRisk: Medium-High - Growing team increases attack surface. Invest in security training, tools, and data protection policies.

actionPlan90Days.action: Complete company registration and legal structure setup
Obtain necessary business licenses and permits
Set up financial systems and accounting processes
Develop and refine pitch deck and investor materials
Implement basic cybersecurity measures and data protection
Launch initial marketing and customer acquisition campaigns
